item.title: Linked List Implementation
item.description: A linked list can be implemented with pointers and dynamic memory allocation struct node { int u; struct node* next; node(int x): u(x), next(nullptr) {} }* head=nullptr; int sz, i; // insert node with value x after the jth node void insert(int x, int j) { sz++; node* n=new node(x); if (!
